content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
The final price we agreed upon was 1300 Euro.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as an 8. He was respectful and fair in his negotiations.
name: Farhad Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer]
There was no instance where I felt discriminated or offended.
name: Farhad Abbasi
